text: I love the lap pool, nice and huge. Nice water features in providing good privacy to all ground floor units and still enjoyed pool view.  Peaceful, well designed condo. Good size layout on Living Hall, dinning and Spacious room. Excellent condo to stay !

Quiet freehold condo with regular competition length swimming pool which is good for lap swimming unlike most condos with odd-shaped pools that are not conducive for exercise. Condo is well-maintained and cleaners work on weekdays. Blocks have been repainted and pool decking has been replaced in 2024.  Majority locals in the community which generally discourages uncivil behaviour and practices.

The condo looks dated. Think time for a new coat of paint. Units interiors are great though. Marble floor, timber flooring. Wes at a 2 bedroom unit. It has a enclosed kitchen which is great and good size too.
One of the Condo with most beautiful pools and pool deck running through the block on both sides. This is what you really call a pool view apartment. Thumb up !!!
My baby love pool, its big size, Well condo but facilities are less like the super market and connecvity and more outter like that
